subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Twins
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-1462351426-1202113414=:66341
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1

Wow that was fast!
  I agree, just have to let it happen.
   
  Misty

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           I made one today, same as the last except I can adjust the sweep level, and where in the band the sweep starts, or do manual sweep. I used to put this function in the boxes, but no one used it, too busy asking stupid questions, or showing the world what great mediums they were cuz they had a box,  so I started leaving it out to save parts, and front panel space. 
 
 I don't think you can force, or coerce spirit, I've always thought it best just to allow. 
 
 Curious--these are for me a change, and they are flying together. Never before have I made a board in 24 hours, it required only a slight shift in the concept.  
 
 Frank-S
